name: TSI Universality
description: Validates the correlation between Topological Stability Index (TSI) and particle lifetime across all known decaying particles.

hypothesis.H0: There is no significant correlation (p > 0.016666) between TSI (n*u/|s|) and particle decay rates across different particle species.
hypothesis.H1: The decay rate Gamma = 1/tau follows an exponential suppression law ln(Gamma) = -A * TSI + B, where TSI represents the geometric barrier to decay.

data_requirements.description: Measured lifetimes of known particles and topological invariants (n, u, s) of their assigned knots.

physical_constraints.notes: The definition of TSI (n*u/|s|) must remain fixed.

test_method: Correlation analysis (R2, p-value) and permutation test.
